SID:Element.SID:Attributes:
<SID:Attribute id="value" atype="lpc_flt" acomment="For parent objects, the strength used in the Marrach dueling system, normally 10 for a normal person, otherwise use 1 for objects.
For child objects, it is the multiplier of the parent's value, normally 1, or 1.1 for a final value of 11.
NOTE: It is has no affect on, and is unaffected by the values in Base:Bulk (for now)." areadonly="false" aquery="query_strength"/>
